text.苫小牧のみんなが、私を見守って\r\nくれている…そんなみんなに胸を\r\n張れ: Everyone in Tomakomai is watching \nover me… I want to be the kind of \nperson who everyone can be proud of.
text.私、きっとずっとがんばれます。\r\n苫小牧を好きになって、そばで\r\n支えて:
I am sure I will be able to do my best 
for a long time. Because I fell in love 
with Tomakomai and met people who 
support me by my side.
text.私は私でいい。真面目で堅い私でも\r\nいい。…ふふ。トレーナーさんと\r\nい: It's okay for me to be me. It's okay to \nbe serious and uptight. That's the \nanswer we found together.
text.お世話になっている方々の年賀状は\r\nまとめて保管してます。こういう\r\nつ: I keep the New Year's greeting cards of those who have helped me. These \nconnections are really important.
text.お渡ししたハスカップチョコケーキ\r\nもう食べました？新名物を作るため\r\n: Have you had the Haskap Chocolate Cake Igave you yet? I need your \nhonest feedback so we can create a \nnew specialty!
text.お菓子教室に通い、試作を重ね、\r\nついに完成しました…その、\r\nお口に合:
After attending pastry classes and 
making many prototypes, I finally 
finished it… well, I will be very happy 
if it suits your palate.
text.七夕イベントに出演するたび、何度\r\n苫小牧に幸あれと願ってきたことか\r\n:
I can't tell you how many times I have wished for the best for Tomakomai 
every time I perform at the Tanabata 
event… In conclusion, it is only my 
effort that counts.
text.ハスカップを使って、ハロウィン\r\nらしい紫のお菓子を作りました！\r\nみん:
We used Haskap to make purple 
candy for Halloween! We want to 
share the taste of Tomakomai with 
everyone…!
text.昔イベントで、サンタ姿でスケート\r\nしながらお客さんにプレゼントを\r\n投:
I remember skating as Santa Claus 
and throwing presents to customers 
at events in the old days… I miss 
those days.
text.苫小牧に、船のライトアップを\r\n眺める定番のコースがありまして。\r\nいつ:
There is a regular course in 
Tomakomai to see the lights of the 
boats. Maybe.... someday we can go 
together.
text.毎年、大掃除には苦労してます。\r\nいただきものに、イベントで使う\r\n道具:
Every year, I have a hard time 
cleaning up. I have so many gifts, 
tools for events… I just have so much 
stuff.
text.お誕生日おめでとうございます！\r\n日ごろの恩返しに、今日は私が\r\nパーテ: Happy Birthday! To repay you for all \nyou've done for me, I'll be your party \nhost today!
text.ハスカップとナナカマドで\r\nフラワーフレームを作ったんです。\r\n喜んで…: I made a flower frame out of a Haskap \nand a Nanakamado. Would you be \npleased...?
text.今日、誕生日なんです。毎年、\r\n地元からたくさんのプレゼントと…\r\nそれ: Today is my birthday. Every year, \nI receive many gifts and good luck \ncharms from my hometown.
text.あなたを、あるイベントにご招待\r\nしたくて…その、私の、誕生日会\r\nです: I'd like to invite you to an event… \nwell, my birthday party. If you don't \nmind, I'd love to!
text.あ、お知らせが来てる！確認して\r\nおかないと…って、ごめんなさい。\r\nト: Oh, there's an announcement! I'll \nhave to check it out… sorry. It was \naddressed to the trainer, wasn't it?
text.わぁ、プレゼントが来てますよ！\r\nこういうの嬉しいですよね。\r\n忘れない: Wow, presents are on their way! I'm \nso happy to see these things. Let's \nreceive them before we forget!
text.ミッションクリア！お見事です！\r\n私もがんばらなきゃ…！: Mission accomplished! Well done! \nI have to work hard too…!
text.イベントが始まるみたいですね。\r\nこれは…苫小牧PRのチャンス！？: It looks like the event is about to \nstart. This is… a Tomakomai PR \nopportunity!?
text.イベントが盛り上がってるみたい\r\nですね。ロコドルとして、\r\nこの機会を: It looks like the event is going to be a \nlot of fun. As a locodol, I can't \nmiss this opportunity…!
text.少し疲れてはいますが…\r\nいえ、がんばります…！: I'm a little tired, but… no, I'll do my \nbest…!
text.お、おかしいな…。\r\n船酔いした時みたいに、\r\nふらふら…する…。: Oh, that's strange…I feel lightheaded \n, like when I get seasick…
text.私の走りで、苫小牧に輝きを…！\r\nハードなトレーニングも\r\nどんとこいの: My running will make Tomakomai \nshine…! I'm willing to go through the \nhardest training!
text.ああ、とまこまい、\r\n白い大地、紙が舞う…♪\r\nはっ、気分がよくて、つい: Oh, Tomakomai, the white earth, the \npaper dancing… ♪ Ha, I feel so good, \nI can't help it…!
text.私の中で、『オン』のスイッチが\r\nはっきり入ってる感じなんです。\r\nいい: I feel like I have a clear "on" switch in \nside me. I think I'm going to get good \nresults!
text.目標のため、不可欠なのは\r\nプロのプラン！今週もお聞かせ\r\nください、ト: For our goals, we need a professional \nplan! Let's me know what we will do \nthis week, Trainer!
text.『なせば成る、なさねば成らぬ、\r\n何事も』！目標のため、今日も\r\nひたす:
If you do it, it will be done, if you 
don't do it, nothing will be done. We 
must keep moving forward today to 
achieve our goal!
text.コンディションは問題ありません。\r\n今日も朝ハスカップ、昼ハスカップ\r\n: I am in good condition. I've been \nnourished with Haskap in the morning \nand Haskap in the afternoon today!
text.なんだか、今日は気が散るなあ…。\r\nあーもうっ、集中、集中…！: I feel kind of distracted today… Oh \nAhhhh, focus, focus…!
text.元気が、出ません…。\r\nかくなる上は…お仕事モード！\r\nなんまら～…けっ: I'm not feeling well… So here we go… \nwork mode! Let's go～………
text.調子、よくないな…こんな時は、\r\n自作の苫小牧写真集で\r\n元気をチャージ:
I'm not feeling well… At times like 
this, I need to recharge my batteries 
with my own Tomakomai photo album 
…!
text.苫小牧のために、今はもっと上を\r\n目指してがんばる時なのに…\r\nだめだな: It's time for Tomakomai to aim higher \nand work harder… I'm not good \nenough, am I…
text.短期的には精神力でカバーできても\r\n無理はやはり後に尾を引くものだと\r\n:
I believe that even if you can cover up 
for a short period of time with your 
mental strength, the strain will 
linger on later. It was the same with 
my work.
text.…がむしゃらに本番に臨み続けても\r\n結果がついてくるとは思えません。\r\n:
…I don't think the results will come if 
we continue to go through with the 
show like a mad dash. …I think we 
should rethink our plan.
text.おかげさまで、最高の状態で\r\n今日を迎えることができました。\r\nみんなの:
Thanks to all of you, we are able to 
greet today in the best possible 
condition. I will live up to everyone's 
expectations!
text.苫小牧の名をみんなの心に刻む\r\nため、必要なのは鮮やかな勝利。\r\n今の私:
In order to etch the name of 
Tomakomai in everyone's hearts, all 
we need is a brilliant victory. If it's me 
now… surely!
text.ロコドル、とまこまい観光大使、\r\nそして戦うウマ娘としても…\r\n今の私は: As a locodol, a Tomakomai Tourism \nAmbassador, and a fighting horsegirl \n… I am now invincible!
text.苫小牧に育まれ、トレーナーさんに\r\n鍛えられたこの脚…\r\n誰にも引けはと: These legs, nurtured in Tomakomai \nand trained by a trainer, are second \nto none.
text.目指すは1着、そしてセンター！\r\n苫小牧の輝き、みなさんに覚えて\r\n帰っ:
Our goal is to get to first place and 
then to the center! Tomakomai's 
brilliance is what I want everyone to 
remember when they return home.
text.走りもライブも、調整はばっちり…\r\nこれなら存分にアピールできます。\r\n:
We are well tuned for running and live 
… This will be a great opportunity to 
show off our skills to the fullest. All 
we have to do is win!
text.ふるさとのみんなも、きっと\r\n見守ってくれていますから。\r\n必ず…勝って: I am sure that everyone in my \nhometown is watching over me. I will \ndefinitely… win!
text.苫小牧の渡り鳥、タルマエです☆\r\n…今日のために考えたライブの\r\nあいさ: I'm Talmae, a migratory bird from \nTomakomai☆… I won't waste the live \ngreetings I've thought up for today!
text.勝つための準備、トレーナーさんと\r\n積み上げてきましたから。\r\nお礼は勝: I have been working with my trainer \nto prepare for victory. I will repay you \nwith a victory.
text.調子がどうあろうと、私は、\r\n勝たなきゃいけないんだから…！\r\nがんばっ: No matter what my condition is, I \nhave to win…! I'll do my best!
text.これくらいの逆境、はね返して\r\nみせます。私はもっと大きな\r\nふるさとの: I will beat back this much adversity. I \nwill overturn even greater adversity in \nmy hometown…!
text.こういう時、苫小牧のみんなは\r\n無理するなって言ってくれるだろう\r\nけど:
At times like this, everyone in 
Tomakomai will tell me not to push 
myself, but… just for today, I'm going 
to push myself!
text.不安はあるけど…くじけない。\r\n…苫小牧のみんなに応えるため、\r\n最後ま:
I am anxious, but… I will not be 
discouraged. To respond to the 
people of Tomakomai, I will fight until 
the very end!
text.調整はうまくいかなかったけど…\r\n勝ちます。私の勝利は、私だけの\r\nため: The adjustments didn't work out… \nbut I will win. Because my victory is \nnot only for me…!
text.正直、調子は悪いですが…\r\nここから逆転劇を見せられれば、\r\nきっと最高:
To be honest, I'm not in great shape 
… but if I can turn things around from 
here, I'm sure I can make a great 
appeal…!
text.おかげさまで、苫小牧に貢献できました！: Thanks to you, I was able to \ncontribute to Tomakomai!
text.次は絶対…センターを、獲る！: Next time… I'm going to win the \ncenter!
text.及第点…でも印象に残るにはもっと…！: Good enough… but not enough to \nleave a lasting impression!
text.故郷のみんなに顔向けできない…！: I can't face everyone back home…!
text.ロコドルとしての経験…今こそ活かします！: My experience as a locodol… now is \nthe time to put it to use!
text.苫小牧のみんな、見ててね！: Tomakomai guys, keep an eye on it!
text.あの頃は1人で気負い過ぎて\r\nいました。私が苫小牧を救うんだ、\r\nって…:
At the time, I was too preoccupied 
with myself. I thought, "I am going to 
save Tomakomai…" Now, we are a 
two-person team.
text.おはようございます！今日も\r\n1人でも多くの人に、苫小牧の\r\n素晴らしさ: Good morning! Today, too, I will tell \nas many people as possible about the \nbeauty of Tomakomai!
text.ウトナイ湖に舞い降りた白鳥の\r\nように！ホッコータルマエ、今日\r\nも華麗:
Like a swan on Lake Utonai! Hokko 
Tarumae, here we come again today 
in all our glory♪……………Yes, thank 
you.
text.おやつの時間はハスカップPRの\r\nチャンス！ジャムを使った絶品\r\nお菓子: Snack time is your chance to promote \nHaskap! We'll be handing out some \ngreat jam-based treats to everyone!
text.とまこま～☆…この挨拶、悪くない\r\nかもしれません。トレーナーさん、\r\n: Tomakoma～☆…this greeting may not \nbe so bad. What do you think, \ntrainer?
text.純朴系を貫くとして…やはり方言\r\n推しが王道…あ、すみません！今後\r\nの:
I'm going to stick to a simple style… 
but I still think that dialect is the way 
to go… oh, sorry! I'm still trying to f 
igure out the direction of my future 
activities.
text.おばんです。…おばんばばーん☆\r\nタルマエです☆…これじゃロコドル\r\nと: Oban-ban-ban☆ I'm Tarumae☆… \nI wonder if this makes me sound like a \nlocodol or a comedian.
text.春ですね。…はっ、衣装に桜っぽい\r\nワンポイントを加えて、初々しさを\r\n:
It's spring, isn't it? …I might add a 
cherry blossom-like point to the 
costume to emphasize the freshness 
… yes, that might be a good idea.
text.暑くて暑くてたまらない…\r\nこんな時こそ栄養満点ハスカップ！\r\nなんと！: It's hot, and unbearable… and at times like these, the nutritious Haskap! \nWhat a surprise! They're in season \nnow!
text.サーモン、ほっけ、ホッキ貝…\r\n他にもたくさん。食欲の秋には\r\n推したい:
Salmon, hokke, hokki-gai… and so 
much more. So many things to push 
one's appetite in the fall, it's hard to 
keep track!
text.来ましたね、この季節が。\r\nふるさとで磨いたアイスダンスで、\r\n苫小牧を:
It's that time of year again. I will 
appeal Tomakomai with my ice 
dancing skills that I have honed in my 
hometown!
text.試作ハスカップスイーツの品評を\r\nフラッシュさんにお願いしまして。\r\n職: We've asked Ms. Flash to evaluate \nour prototype haskap sweets. We aim \nfor a taste recognized by the artisans!
text.ファル子さん、ライブで目が合った\r\n瞬間にウインクをくれて…ドキッと\r\n: Falco-san winked at me the moment \nour eyes met at the concert… I was \nso thrilled. I was so impressed.
text.アキュートさんの作る大根のお漬物\r\nおいしいんですよ。次お茶する時は\r\n:
The daikon pickles made by Acute are 
delicious. Next time we have tea, I'll 
bring some of Tomakomai's famous 
sweets!
text.リッキーとカラオケ行くと合いの手\r\nがすごいんですよ。2人なのに、\r\nラ: When Ricky and I go out to karaoke, \nwe do a lot of choreography. It's just \n2 people but it feel like live concert...
text.実は登山が趣味なんです。その縁で\r\n樽前山近くのキャンプ場のPRを\r\nや: Actually, I enjoy mountain climbing. \nI once did PR for a campground near \nMt. Tarumae.
text.恋の歌はカワイイ系でいいとして、\r\nロックの時はどんな方向性に\r\nしよう:
If I can go in a cute direction for love 
songs, what direction should I take 
for rock songs… hmmm… it's a tough 
one.
text.今のままでも素敵な衣装…ですが、\r\n例えばボタンをほっき貝風にすれば\r\n: It's a nice outfit as it is, but if you \nmade the buttons more like shells, for \nexample, it would be even nicer… no?
text.この服を着ると、ロコドル駆け出し\r\n時代の記憶がよみがえってきます…\r\n:
Wearing this dress brings back 
memories of my early days as a 
locodol… So many things happened… 
so many things…
text.胸のリボンはハナショウブ。\r\n花言葉と同じく『嬉しい知らせ』を\r\n苫小牧:
The ribbon on the chest is a 
Japanese water iris. Just like the 
language of flowers, we hope to bring 
"happy news" to Tomakomai.
text.今日も1日大変だべなあ。\r\nでも、元気出してけっぱるべ～☆\r\n…うん、今:
It's going to be another tough day. 
But I'm going to cheer myself up and 
work hard～☆ …Yeah, I think I did a 
good job with that one.
text.カフェテリアでの苫小牧フェアを\r\n提案してまして。実現を目指して、\r\n今:
I am proposing a Tomakomai Fair in 
the cafeteria. We are currently 
working on a lunch menu to make it a 
reality.
text.夜空を見上げなければ星の輝きには\r\n気づきません。苫小牧に必要なのも\r\n:
If you don't look up at the night sky, 
you won't notice the stars. What 
Tomakomai needs is for people to 
first notice their brilliance!
text.お花見イベントで地元のキャラと\r\n一緒に司会したことがあるんです。\r\n検: I've hosted a hanami event with local \ncharacters. You can see some photos \nif you search for it.
text.夏祭りのシーズンは他の市にもよく\r\nお呼ばれしてました。ただ移動は\r\n基:
I was often invited to other cities 
during the summer festival season. 
However, I had to move around by my 
self… it was quite difficult…
text.秋はやっぱり食レポのお仕事が\r\n増えまして。ウマ娘の胃袋に任せて\r\nつい:
I was working more and more on food 
reports in the fall. I was a little 
over-zealous in my work, letting my 
horsegirl's stomach take care of itself 
…
text.昔、札幌のイベントに出演したん\r\nですが、雪の多さに驚きました。\r\n苫小:
I used to perform at an event in 
Sapporo and was surprised at the 
amount of snow. Tomakomai has very 
little snow.
text.私の活躍が、苫小牧のみんなを\r\n勇気づけられるように…\r\n今日もよろしく: May my success inspire everyone in \nTomakomai… and I look forward to \nworking with you today!
text.私が輝けば、苫小牧の輝きに\r\nみんなが気づいてくれる…。\r\nそう信じて、: If I shine, everyone will notice the \nbrilliance of Tomakomai… With this \nbelief, I will do my best!
text.ストレッチは30分以上かけたし、\r\n心拍数も十分上げておきました！\r\nい: I spent at least 30 minutes stretching \n, and I kept my heart rate up enough! \nI can start anytime!
text.確かな実力を身につけなきゃ…！\r\nそう、旨味がぎっしり詰まった、\r\n旬の: You have to learn to be a master…! \nJust like a hokki-gai clam in season, \npacked with flavor…!
text.ふるさとの海岸を思い出すなあ…\r\nますますやる気が出てきますっ。: It reminds me of the coast of my \nhometown… I am getting more and \nmore motivated.
text.故郷のため、やれる限りのこと、\r\nすべてやり切りたいんです…。\r\nどうか: I want to do everything I can for my \nhometown. Please help us!
text.私のこと、苫小牧のこと、大事に\r\n考えてくれる人に会えて…本当に\r\nよか:
I am very happy to have met someone 
who cares about me and Tomakomai. 
I am truly happy to have met 
someone who cares about me and 
Tomakomai.
text.力を合わせ、苫小牧に輝きを。\r\nもし願いを叶えたら…その、2人で\r\n地元:
Join forces and make Tomakomai 
shine. If we make your wish come 
true… well, why don't the two of you 
attend a local event?
text.大切な故郷を、輝かせることができました…！: We were able to make our precious \nhometown shine…!
text.ここまでがんばれたのは…\r\nあなたのおかげです。: I have worked so hard to get this far \n… thanks to you.
text.ロコドルとして\r\n芸の幅が広がりそうです！: I'm sure I'll be able to expand my \nartistic horizons as a locodol!
text.ホッコータルマエ、はっちゃきこくべ！: ホッコータルマエ、はっちゃきこくべ！
text.最速ロコドル、苫小牧から\r\n参上だべ～☆…よし、決まった！: The fastest locodol, from Tomakomai \n～☆.... yes that will do!
text.期待に応えて！: I'll live up to your expectations!
text.あの街知ってる？苫小牧！\r\nおいしさ溢れる苫小牧！いいとこいっぱい、\r\n:
Do you know that town? Tomakomai! 
Tomakomai is overflowing with 
deliciousness! So many great places, 
let's go! Tomakomai!
text.勝利の栄光、ふるさとにささげます！: I offer to my hometown, the glory of \nmy victory!
text.応援ありがとう！苫小牧の星、タルマエでした☆: Thanks for the support! I'm Tarumae, \nthe star of Tomakomai☆.
text.目標に近づくためには\r\n努力あるのみ、ですよね。: To get closer to our goal, we have to \nwork hard, right?
text.苫小牧の街と同じく、\r\n学園にも歴史あり、ですね。: Just like the city of Tomakomai, the \nschool has a long history.
text.1着を獲って\r\nPRにつなげましょう！: Let's get that first place and get some \nPR!
text.ウマ娘名鑑のレベルが上がった\r\nみたいです。トレーナーさんの\r\n努力の成:
It looks like the level of horsegirl's 
directory has been raised. Let's 
check the results of the trainer's 
efforts!
text.大切なものを\r\n受け継いだ気がします！: I feel like I've inherited something \nprecious!
text.きちんと着こなすことが、\r\nカワイさの秘訣だべっ☆: Dressing properly. That's the secret \nto being cute☆
text.カワイイ衣装…ですが問題は、\r\nいかに苫小牧PRにつなげるか…。: Cute costumes… but the problem is \nhow to promote Tomakomai…
text.ナナカマドに白鳥に…\r\n苫小牧シンボル満載です！: Nanakamado, swans, swans… \nTomakomai is full of symbols!
text.めんこい衣装だべな～☆\r\n…うーん、ちょっとわざとらしい？: I love the outfit ☆… hmmm is it a bit \npretentious?
text.イベントミッションはここっ♪\r\nクリスマスを盛り上げるべ～～っ！\r\n…み: The event mission is here♪ \nGet excited for Christmas! \n…How about something like that?
